activities: Jetsetter provides consumers with access to travel services. Jetsetter obtains personal information directly from consumers as well as from business partners and other third parties. Jetsetter uses the information to (i) register consumers for membership on the company’s websites, (ii) provide products and services members request, (iii) communicate with members about products, services, offers, events and promotions, (iv) tailor products and services to suit members’ personal interests, (v) operate, evaluate and improve the company’s business; (vi) analyze and enhance marketing communications and strategies, (vii) protect against fraud, (viii) enforce Website Terms of Use and Terms and Conditions, (ix) comply with applicable legal requirements and industry standards, and company policies, and (x) for other purposes described in the Jetsetter Website Privacy Notice.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line, on-line and manually processed consumer data
recoursemech: Jetsetter will cooperate with JAMS in accordance with the JAMS International Mediation Rules.
